content: a novelty afghan square based on the serpent starfish i found one of these little creatures on the beach last summer and was blown away by the beautiful design on the body and the segmented legs amazing i originally designed this as a showcase for the bullion stitch but as not everyone enjoys this stitch i have added an alternative puff version the legs are overlaid on a rippled rock pool and the whole thing surrounded by a narrow shell and seaweed border this will be the main square for september 2024 crochet block a month group where there will be help and discussion carefully tested by jacqui jilly lynne and sandra many thanks
